lyrics_examined:
In the fog we sail, our spirits pale
Through forgotten seas we roam...
Each heart a ghost, in shadows tossed,
A crew of spirits, doomed to float.
'Tis the Ghost Ship, lost and drifting free,
Through the mists we silently move.
The winds they whisper, stories of thee,
Our hearts echo, your melody.
In the haze we sail, our spirits pale,
A ship of ghosts, forever roam...
